input_brief: Translate IGR-001 outputs into concrete design briefs for 6 themes; produce 2 high-fidelity variant prompts per theme with layout specs, palettes, and feasibility notes.

outputs.concept_summary: An all-seeing eye looming above a government capitol silhouette — merging conspiracy mystique with surveillance-state commentary. Dark, moody, powerful.

layout.composition: Centered eye at upper third, capitol building silhouette along bottom third, radiant geometric lines connecting them. Negative space used heavily.
layout.element_placement: Eye dominates top, rays extend down to frame the capitol dome. Slogan text at very bottom in small caps.

color_palette.notes: Gold on dark — conveys power and secrecy. Deep red accent for danger/urgency.

typography.heading_style: Condensed geometric sans-serif (e.g., Bebas Neue, Oswald)

image_prompts.prompt: Dark moody digital illustration of a giant golden all-seeing eye floating above a shadowy US Capitol dome silhouette, geometric rays of light emanating from the eye connecting to the building, deep navy-black background with subtle noise texture, conspiracy art style, occult symbolism, gold and dark red color scheme, highly detailed, dramatic lighting from behind the eye, 4K, poster composition, portrait orientation

Minimalist vector art, single illuminati-style eye constructed from thin gold linework hovering over a simplified capitol building outline, dark charcoal background, Art Deco geometric patterns radiating outward, clean sharp edges, screenprint aesthetic, limited color palette of black gold and crimson, t-shirt ready design, transparent background, centered composition

pod_product_fit.notes: Best on black/navy tees. Portrait crop works for front chest print or oversized back print.
Hero product — full bleed portrait format.
Crop to eye + rays section for vertical phone format.
Back print, large format. Gold foil if available.

feasibility.print_considerations: Gold tones may need color calibration for DTG printing. V2 vector version is more print-friendly.
feasibility.potential_issues: Eye symbolism is popular — differentiation matters. Keep style distinct.

outputs.target_audience: Conspiracy culture enthusiasts, truth-seeker community, edgy streetwear buyers, 18-35 male-skewing

outputs.concept_summary: Urban cityscape woven with hidden cryptic symbols, codes, and glyphs — the city as a puzzle to be decoded. Cyberpunk meets Da Vinci Code.

layout.composition: Wide panoramic skyline with cryptic symbols embedded in building windows, signs, and sky. Can also be cropped square for social.
layout.element_placement: Skyline spans full width at center. Cipher text overlaid as translucent layer. Slogan integrated into a building sign or billboard element.

color_palette.notes: Dark teal-to-black gradient with neon green accents. Cyberpunk/hacker aesthetic.

typography.heading_style: Monospaced terminal font (e.g., JetBrains Mono, Source Code Pro)
typography.body_style: Same monospaced, varying opacity for depth
typography.text_placement: Integrated into the cityscape as signs/billboards or as a terminal-style overlay
typography.hierarchy: Text is part of the art, not separate

image_prompts.prompt: Cyberpunk cityscape at night with neon green cryptic symbols and cipher text floating across building facades and the sky, dark teal and black color scheme, glowing matrix-style code rain in background, highly detailed digital painting, wide panoramic composition, mysterious atmosphere, fog and light pollution, reflections on wet streets, 4K ultra-detailed

Minimalist flat illustration of a city skyline where each building window contains a different cryptic symbol or glyph, clean geometric style, dark background with teal gradient sky, single accent color neon green for the symbols which glow softly, screenprint-ready limited colors, landscape orientation, modern poster design

pod_product_fit.notes: Wide format prints, desk mats. Landscape hero.
Crop to square center section for chest print. V2 flat version preferred.
Landscape format fits naturally.
Wrap-around panoramic print works great.

feasibility.print_considerations: V1 detailed version is complex for smaller products. V2 flat version scales better. Neon green needs RGB-to-CMYK attention.
feasibility.potential_issues: Landscape orientation limits t-shirt placement options. Provide square crop variant.

outputs.target_audience: Tech enthusiasts, hacker culture, cyberpunk fans, gamers, urban art lovers, 18-30

outputs.concept_summary: Declassified document aesthetic — heavy black redaction bars over text with key words revealed. The tension between censorship and revelation.

layout.composition: Styled as a government document page. Rows of 'text' with thick black redaction bars. Key words/phrases left visible to form a hidden message.
layout.element_placement: Document fills frame edge-to-edge. Visible words are the design focus. Optional 'CLASSIFIED' stamp at angle in upper corner.

color_palette.notes: Aged paper cream, stark black bars, red 'CLASSIFIED' stamp. Authentic document feel.

typography.heading_style: Typewriter serif (e.g., Courier New, American Typewriter)
typography.body_style: Same typewriter font, varied sizes for document authenticity
typography.text_placement: Full-page document layout. Visible words form the slogan/message between redaction bars.
typography.hierarchy: The revealed text IS the design — everything else is visual noise/context

image_prompts.prompt: Photorealistic aged government document with heavy black redaction bars covering most text, cream-colored old paper texture with coffee stains and fold marks, a few key words visible between bars reading 'THE TRUTH WAS NEVER HIDDEN', red CLASSIFIED stamp at 15-degree angle in top right, paper clip visible at top, highly detailed texture, portrait orientation, overhead flat-lay photography style

Bold graphic design poster of a stylized redacted document, thick geometric black bars on clean white background, the visible words between bars spell out 'WHAT ARE THEY HIDING', minimal and modern, sharp clean edges, bold red accent line at top, Swiss typography influence, screenprint aesthetic, high contrast, portrait orientation, t-shirt ready

pod_product_fit.notes: V2 works on white/cream tees. Striking chest print.
Invert — white bars on dark shirt with red stamp.
V1 photorealistic version as art print. Frame-ready.
Small 'CLASSIFIED' stamp sticker as accessory product.
V2 clean version crops well for phone format.

feasibility.print_considerations: Simple color count — very print-friendly. V2 is essentially 2-3 colors. Easy DTG and screenprint.
feasibility.potential_issues: Concept is well-trodden — execution quality and specific word choices differentiate.

outputs.target_audience: Political skeptics, free-speech advocates, streetwear audience, meme-aware buyers, 16-35

outputs.concept_summary: Surveillance meets ethereal — all-seeing eyes emerging from or hidden within cloud formations, blending organic natural beauty with unsettling digital oversight.

layout.composition: Centered cloud mass with multiple eyes subtly embedded. Can be read as beautiful sky art from distance, surveillance commentary up close.
layout.element_placement: Cloud formation fills 70% of frame. Eyes partially obscured within cloud texture. Optional subtle binary/data stream falling like rain below.

color_palette.notes: Steel blue and muted cream clouds on dark sky. Gold iris accents for the eyes. Twilight mood.

typography.heading_style: Thin modern sans-serif (e.g., Montserrat Thin, Futura Light)
typography.text_placement: Bottom edge, very subtle, almost whispered
typography.hierarchy: Image is everything — text is nearly invisible tagline

image_prompts.prompt: Surreal digital painting of dramatic cumulus clouds in a twilight sky with multiple human eyes subtly embedded within the cloud formations, golden irises catching light, clouds lit from below in steel blue and warm cream tones, dark navy sky above, ethereal and unsettling atmosphere, hyperrealistic cloud textures with surreal eye elements, square composition, fine art quality, 4K

Clean vector illustration of stylized cloud shapes containing geometric eye symbols, muted blue and cream palette on dark background, thin gold linework for eye details, digital rain of binary code falling from clouds like rainfall, modern flat design with depth through layering, square format, minimalist but conceptually rich, poster and apparel ready

pod_product_fit.notes: Art print hero product. V1 as premium fine art print.
V2 vector version for chest print. Square crops well to standard print areas.
V1 as gallery-wrapped canvas — premium product.
V2 centered on tote. Artsy carry piece.

feasibility.print_considerations: V1 requires high-resolution source. Subtle eye details may get lost on small products. V2 scales better.
feasibility.potential_issues: Eyes-in-clouds concept needs careful execution to avoid looking creepy vs artistic. Test both variants.

outputs.target_audience: Surrealist art fans, tech-critical thinkers, aesthetics-driven buyers, gallery/art crowd, 20-40

outputs.concept_summary: Sacred geometry and occult symbols overlaid on digital data grid patterns — ancient mysticism meets modern technology. The idea that data IS the new magic.

layout.composition: Centered sacred geometry pattern (Metatron's Cube, Flower of Life, or similar) with data grid/circuit board patterns integrated into the geometric lines.
layout.element_placement: Central mandala-like geometry fills 80% of frame. Corner elements with smaller supporting glyphs. Text integrated into outer ring if needed.

color_palette.notes: Deep purple-black base, electric purple sacred geometry, cyan data accents. Mystical-tech fusion.

typography.body_style: Monospaced for data elements within the design
typography.text_placement: Integrated into the geometric pattern as part of the art, or as outer ring inscription
typography.hierarchy: Geometry IS the content — text is structural/decorative

image_prompts.prompt: Intricate sacred geometry mandala combining Metatron's Cube with circuit board trace patterns, deep purple and black background, electric purple geometric lines with cyan node points glowing at intersections, occult symbols at vertices, data stream textures flowing through geometric channels, dark mystical atmosphere, highly detailed symmetrical design, square format, 4K, digital art

Bold graphic occult data grid design, simplified Flower of Life pattern where each circle contains a different tech symbol (WiFi, power, binary, cursor), clean vector style, deep purple background, bright cyan linework, minimal color palette, screenprint ready, symmetrical, apparel-friendly square composition, modern occult aesthetic

pod_product_fit.notes: Central chest print on black tees. The symmetry makes it a perfect center-chest design.
Square format art print. Premium paper with metallic accents if possible.
Holographic sticker of the mandala pattern — high perceived value.
Symmetrical design centers perfectly on phone cases.
Large format wall tapestry — mandala designs sell well in this category.

feasibility.print_considerations: Symmetry must be perfect — any slight misalignment is very noticeable. V2 vector version is production-safer.
feasibility.potential_issues: Sacred geometry is a saturated market. The data/tech fusion angle is the differentiator — lean into it.

outputs.target_audience: Spiritual-tech crossover audience, sacred geometry enthusiasts, new-age tech workers, festival/rave culture, 18-35

outputs.concept_summary: A titan-scale all-seeing eye surveying the globe — the mythological figure of Atlas reimagined not as holding the world, but watching it. Power, scale, omniscience.

layout.composition: A massive face/eye at the top third gazing downward at a small Earth or globe below. Dramatic scale difference emphasizes power dynamic.
layout.element_placement: Giant eye/partial face dominates upper 60%. Small detailed globe sits in lower third. Connecting element (light beam, gaze line, geometric bridge) links them.

color_palette.notes: Deep space navy, midnight blue layers, electric blue for the eye/gaze beam. Cosmic scale feeling.

typography.heading_style: Wide tracking uppercase serif (e.g., Cinzel, Trajan Pro)
typography.text_placement: Below the globe or at very bottom. Grand, monumental feel.
typography.hierarchy: Title treatment — 'THE GAZE OF ATLAS' as a statement piece

image_prompts.prompt: Epic digital painting of a colossal ethereal eye emerging from cosmic darkness gazing down at a small glowing Earth below, deep navy and midnight blue space environment, the eye emits a beam of electric blue light illuminating the globe, stars and nebula in background, sense of immense scale and power, cinematic dramatic lighting, portrait orientation, concept art quality, 4K ultra-detailed

Bold graphic poster design of a stylized giant eye at top with geometric rays extending down to a simplified globe wireframe at bottom, flat vector style, deep navy background, electric blue linework and fills, atlas mythology meets modern surveillance commentary, clean bold shapes, limited color palette, screenprint aesthetic, portrait orientation, apparel and poster ready

pod_product_fit.notes: Statement piece. Large format 24x36 preferred. V1 as premium art print.
V2 vector version as oversized back print. The vertical composition suits full-back prints.
Back print hero. Front small logo version (just the eye).
V1 as vertical canvas. Gallery-worthy.
Crop to eye section only for phone format.

feasibility.print_considerations: V1 is illustration-heavy and needs skilled AI prompting or manual work. V2 is cleaner for production. Consider a small 'logo-only' version (just the eye) for secondary products.
feasibility.potential_issues: Concept is grand — execution must match. Cheap-looking versions will feel generic. Invest in V1 quality.

outputs.target_audience: Mythology fans, cosmic/space art lovers, philosophical thinkers, premium streetwear buyers, 20-40
